title: Maharakshak Devi
overview: Maharakshak Devi is the story of the most powerful girl in the world, although she is unaware of her extraordinary powers. She spent the first 17 years of her life away from human civilization. Her extraordinary journey starts when she comes back and has to battle asuras, evils that are seemingly contemporary, but have taken multiple forms over the generations. Only Devi and her companions can attempt to defeat the asuras.
